fields.name: Passives:
fields.value:
- Vengeful: If anyone attacks you during D1/N1 of the game, you must Kill those players. If not, Kill the first player that attacks you instead. Cannot be yourself. 
- Defiance: When you die for the first time without having won, instead live at 1HP.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Search: Discard 2 cards. Draw 2 cards. [Infinite uses, 2 CD] 
- Supplies: Draw 2 cards immediately. [3 uses, 2 CD] 
- Inquire: Choose a player. Learn if they are the one who attacked you first. [2 uses, 4 CD]

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Live to Kill the Player(s) that attack you during D1/N1 of the game. If none, then Kill the player that first attacks you.
